message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500. Let me know if that sounds good to you!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you being willing to negotiate.  However,  $11,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I understand that $10,500 is a bit of a stretch for you, Bob, but I'm still confident that you'll really value this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,000. Let me know if that's more to your liking!

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, $11,000 is still a bit more than I can comfortably spend.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,750?  This would be a good deal for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I can offer it to you for $11,200. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great value for you.
